mapper.sql: id, `name`, menu_id, url_perm, btn_perm, deleted, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.naem, t1.menu_id, t1.url_perm, t1.btn_perm, t3.code FROM sys_permission t1 LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission t2 ON t1.id = t2.permission_id LEFT JOIN sys_role t3 ON t2.role_id = t3.id where t1.deleted = ${@cn.goduck.kl.common.core.constant.GlobalConstant@VALID} and t3.deleted = ${@cn.goduck.kl.common.core.constant.GlobalConstant@VALID}
